title: Scimitar
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                           | Scimitar                                  |
| :--------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades") |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 12                                        |
| Accuracy                                       | 0                                         |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 14 (140%)                                 |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 7 at skill 14                             |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 1H                                        |
| Size                                           | Medium                                    |
| Ranged?                                        | No                                        |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A long sword with a wide, curved blade.***"The museum-cabinet and huge library arrogated themselves the entire lower floor — there were the controversial and incompatible books that are somehow the history of the nineteenth century; there were scimitars from Nishapur, in whose frozen crescents the wind and violence of battle seemed to be living on."-Jorge Luis Borges, \_The Form of the Sword\_. 1953. trans. Andrew Hurley. |

> This weapon falls into the [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades") category. It is a one handed weapon.

**Scimitars** are the best of the "common" one-handed [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades"). While you may eventually wish to upgrade to a [demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") or a [double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword"), you can use a scimitar while you're still waiting to find one.

Notably, [efreets](/Efreet "Efreet"), [Erica](/Erica "Erica"), and [Azrael](/Azrael "Azrael") always carry [flaming](/Flame "Flame") scimitars.

|              | Scimitar                                                            |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Mundane**  | [![Scimitar1.png](/images/e/eb/Scimitar1.png)](/File:Scimitar1.png) |
| **Magical**  | [![Scimitar2.png](/images/e/e2/Scimitar2.png)](/File:Scimitar2.png) |
| **Artefact** | [![Scimitar3.png](/images/b/bf/Scimitar3.png)](/File:Scimitar3.png) |

## History

- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Long Blades lost [riposte](/Riposte "Riposte"). Damage was increased back to pre-riposte levels.
- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), Long Blades gained riposte. All Long Blades were reduced by 1 base damage to compensate.

| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club](/Club "Club") • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar]() • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

html:
Scimitar

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Scimitar
Skill Long Blades
Damage 12
Accuracy 0
Base delay (%) 14 (140%)
Min delay 7 at skill 14
Hands 1H
Size Medium
Ranged? No
A long sword with a wide, curved blade.

"The museum-cabinet and huge library arrogated themselves the entire lower floor — there were the controversial and incompatible books that are somehow the history of the nineteenth century; there were scimitars from Nishapur, in whose frozen crescents the wind and violence of battle seemed to be living on."

-Jorge Luis Borges, _The Form of the Sword_. 1953.
trans. Andrew Hurley.

This weapon falls into the Long Blades category. It is a one handed weapon.

Scimitars are the best of the "common" one-handed Long Blades. While you may eventually wish to upgrade to a demon blade or a double sword, you can use a scimitar while you're still waiting to find one.

Notably, efreets, Erica, and Azrael always carry flaming scimitars.

Scimitar
Mundane
Magical
Artefact

History

  • In 0.28, Long Blades lost riposte. Damage was increased back to pre-riposte levels.
  • In 0.19, Long Blades gained riposte. All Long Blades were reduced by 1 base damage to compensate.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net
